name: Shelter
tagline: Your AI financial advisor, connected to your real bank data
description:
Shelter connects AI agents to your real bank data through Plaid. Check safe-to-spend, predict cash crunches before they hit, find zombie subscriptions draining your accounts, simulate whether you can afford a purchase, and get AI coaching tailored to your situation.
